active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the role of uptime monitoring in preventing revenue loss for an e-commerce API (e.g., during Black Friday). How does it balance Availability in the CIA triad with security risks like exposing heartbeat endpoints? Cite real-world examples from sources like UptimeRobot case studies.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Bloom's Taxonomy, active learning, and scaffolding for optimal retention. Topic: Uptime Monitoring (Cybersecurity > 008_Application Security > 006_API Security > 010_API Monitoring and Logging > Security Monitoring > Uptime Monitoring). Use provided research (definitions, synthetic/RUM, checks: HTTP/HTTPS/Ping/Heartbeat/etc., tools like UptimeRobot), voter consensus (complete Heartbeat: app sends periodic HTTP to monitor; add tools/best practices/security links), and big picture (CIA Availability, API revenue protection). Incorporate: - Learning objectives: [INSERT learning_objectives ARRAY HERE] - Scaffolding layers: [INSERT scaffolding OBJECT HERE] - Active learning ties where relevant. Generate flashcards per schema: [INSERT flashcard_schema HERE]. Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards, 40-60 total, covering all layers/objectives evenly. Ensure API security focus, distractors from misconceptions (e.g., Ping verifies API responses). Explanations reference hierarchy/research/voters.
